game

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Characters
      • game.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Player
extends Characters
implements java.io.Serializable
    A player is controlled by a client to interact with and move around the game world
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public void decreaseHealth(int amount)
        Decreases the players health according to the amount entered into parameter. health = health - amount;
        Parameters:

        returns if you're dead or alive.

        Sets the hit field which determines whether a player has been hit by a player or not.
        Parameters:
        trueOrFalse - - true sets hit to true, false sets hit to false.
